thread.section_title: Rosewood Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A luxury hotel makes you forget where you are
thread.title_full: A luxury hotel makes you forget where you are - Review of Rosewood Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: WengbyWeng
title: A luxury hotel makes you forget where you are
text:
the hotel room is so big! You got a bedroom, a living room, a walk-in closet, a bathhouse with a bathtub and a shower.
There's three TV in your hotel room, plus a DVD player and a stereo.
They provide you 8 Nespresso capsules for different favors, four kinds of tea bag, with a hot water heater.
Please do check it out the Mei Bar at Level 5, it's a big place, with three different bars, an open air area with heater, two lounges.
Please do visit the swimming pool and gym at Level 6, it's heated pool about 30C , and a hot jacuzzi about 38C. The ceiling about the pool is high and glassed, makes you feel swimming in a green house.
The breakfast at Lobby level is also outstanding.
Room Tip: Choose a higher level if you can . See more room tips
